sources.title: Hollow (2011)
sources.description: On holiday in the English countryside, two young couples uncover an ancient evil.

metadata.Plot: An old monastery in a small, remote village in Suffolk, England has been haunted by a local legend for centuries. Left in ruin and shrouded by the mystery of a dark spirit that wills young couples to suicide, the place has been avoided for years, marked only by a twisted, ancient tree with an ominous hollow said to be the home of great evil. When four friends on holiday explore the local folklore, they realize that belief in a myth can quickly materialize into reality, bringing horror to life for the town.
metadata.Actors: Emily Plumtree, Sam Stockman, Jessica Ellerby
